title: The Rosen Law Firm Ranked 1st in the Nation for Number of Securities Class Action Settlements by Institutional Shareholder Services
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Rosen Law Firm was ranked 1 st in the nation for the number of securities class action settlements it achieved in 2017 by Institutional Shareholder Services. This ranking is featured in the ISS Securities Class Action Services report “Top 50 of 2017” and marks the fourth year in a row that the firm has held a spot in the top two.
“That we’ve been able to consistently achieve these rankings is a testament to the firm’s leadership in the space and talented staff,” said Phil Kim, a partner of the firm. The ranking credits plaintiffs’ law firms that served as court approved lead or co-lead counsel. In total, The Rosen Law Firm obtained 22 settlements totaling over $55 million for defrauded shareholders in 2017. “We are proud to lead the ISS rankings this year,” said Larry Rosen, the founder of the firm. “Our goal is to continue protecting the rights of investors. We do this by holding public companies and their management accountable for their misdeeds.”
About The Rosen Law Firm
The Rosen Law Firm is dedicated exclusively to recovering investment losses for institutional and individual investors in public and private companies that have misrepresented material aspects of their business or whose officers and directors have breached their fiduciary duties to shareholders. Our attorneys have education or experience working in finance and combine this with a history of handling complex litigation to achieve significant settlements for our clients.
